title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1245.8 - Confidentiality; Sealed Documents; Redaction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1245.8 - Confidentiality; Sealed Documents; Redaction

State Regulations
E-filed matters deemed confidential by
statute or court directive, as well as sealed documents or documents that are
the subject of an application to seal in an e-filed matter, shall be filed and
maintained on the NYSCEF site in a manner that precludes viewing by the public
and such other persons as the case may require. In all matters, authorized
e-filers shall attest to compliance with statutory redaction requirements
(e.g., General Business Law ยง 399-d dd) and relevant sealing requirements
in filings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1245.8

Adopted

New

York State Register May 23, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 21, eff. 3/1/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
